CredentialsFoundSignInComponent.HEADLINE: Good news. You already have a login to listen on the SXM App.
CredentialsFoundSignInComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: Simply log in to the SXM App with the username and password you created when you last registered. If you’ve forgotten your login, we can help you retrieve it.

SetupSubscriptionCredentialsFormComponen.HEADLINE: Your subscription includes streaming.
SetupSubscriptionCredentialsFormComponen.SUBTITLE: Set up your login to start listening in the SXM App.
SetupSubscriptionCredentialsFormComponen.INSTRUCTIONS: These are the login credentials you’ll use to manage your account online, as well as to listen in the SXM App.
SetupSubscriptionCredentialsFormComponen.SYSTEM_ERROR: We’re sorry… something went wrong. We’re experiencing technical issues and are working on resolving it. Please try again.

ERRORS.ALREADY_EXIST: That username/email is associated with another account.
That email is associated with another account.

ERRORS.LENGTH: Your password must be {{ min }} to {{ max }} characters long.
ERRORS.POLICY: Your password must contain at least one character from at least 3 different groups, as explained in our password policy.
ERRORS.GENERIC: Your password does not fulfill all the requirements
ERRORS.PII_DATA: Password cannot contain first name, last name or email address.

SetupSubscriptionCredentialsFormComponen.CONFIRM_EMAIL_UPDATE_MODAL_SUBTITLE: The email you entered is different than the one currently on your subscription. Would you like to replace your existing email with the suggestion below?
SetupSubscriptionCredentialsFormComponen.EMAIL_UPDATE_MODAL_SUBTITLE: Your subscription will be updated with the email address you provided.
